headline: Instagram teases AI tools for editing appearances, backgrounds in videos using prompts
summary: Instagram head Adam Mosseri is teasing upcoming generative AI features for the social app that will allow creators to "change nearly any aspect" of their videos using text prompts. The editing tools will be powered by Meta's Movie Gen AI model, and are expected to launch on the social network sometime next year, Mosseri said in a video shared on Thursday. headline: Adobe Stock Slips 20% in a Week: Should You Brace for a Tough 2025?
summary: ADBE shares are benefiting from strong demand for its creative products and expanding clientele amid increasing competition and stretched valuation.
